Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Howard. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays Affecting Red Line Trains at Howard
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with delays and congestion after earlier police activity at Howard. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with delays and congestion after earlier police activity at Howard. Crews working to restore normal service.

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Crews are working to clear the congestion that's formed and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.
